1583042400.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
1583042400.descr: Bloomberg Real Yield focuses on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field. The show provides critical intelligence and analysis, allowing its audience to stay ahead of the competition.

1583044200.title: At the Top
1583044200.descr: Kim Fornais, Saxo Bank, CEO & Founder. Saxo Bank serves clients in over 170 countries and processes over a million transactions a day. CEO and Founder Kim Fournais joins us in Dubai.

1583046000.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
1583046000.descr: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

1583047800.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1583047800.descr: Emily Chang sits down with the biggest influencers in technology & media to find out who they are, how they got there, and where they're going. Bloomberg Studio 1.0 is a series of in-depth conversations with the very people shaping the future of business, underscoring their visions for what comes next.
